ref: 10146 mukula n. ʻ bud ʼ Suśr., makula -- 2 n. lex. 2. mukura -- , makura -- 2 n. lex. 3. *bakula -- 2. [Cf. similar interchange of initial in bakula -- 1. -- ← Drav., Tam. mokkuḷ &c., DED 4007; also mudgara -- 2 m. ʻ bud ʼ lex. with same variation of -- k -- ~ -- dg -- as in mukuṣṭha -- ]
S. mora f. ʻ budding ʼ, morṛo m. ʻ fresh new leaf ʼ.
